snippet: Greg S. Harris, a former official of the Baseball Hall of Fame and Museum and partner in a celebrated vintage record store, will take over as president and chief executive of the rock hall on Jan. 1.
abstract: Greg S. Harris, a former official of the Baseball Hall of Fame and Museum and partner in a celebrated vintage record store, will take over as president and chief executive of the rock hall on Jan. 1.

headline.main: The Rock Hall of Fame Names a New Frontman

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum
